Я должен доделать отправку запроса на участие в аукционах со станиц аукциона.
NOT REQUESTED
APPROVAL_REQUESTED, NOT_REQUESTED or APPROVED
approval Actions

Some auction houses require the user to request an approval for each auction specifically. This is determined by the approvalRequired field of an auctionInfo object. In addition, an auction house may require the user to provide a payment method in order to participate in the auction. This is determined by the paymentMethodRequired field. see “Working with payment methods” for information on how to handle payment methods in the system. To request participation in an auction use the approvalsrequestToParticipateInAuction api. to check if the user is approved use the approvalsgetAuctionApprovalState api.

When a successful payment method is saved, Stripe server is supposed to contact bidspirit server and give the user card details. until this process is complete the card is not saved in bidspirit. You need to wait until bidspirit server confirms it received a valid payment method. This is done by the api userspaymentMethodscheckPaymentMethodSaved with the stripePaymentMethodId you got in the previous stage. this method will return a success, error or pending reply. in case of a pending reply - wait one second and call the api again.
gets a secret for stripe js api, which will allow the user to add a payment method
